metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6941 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
win_useradd, salt-cloud and the Linode driver in salt 2015.5.x before 2015.5.6, and 2015.8.x before 2015.8.1 leak password information in debug logs. It was discovered that the salt has a vulnerability where it exposes sensitive informations in the log files. An attacker could use this retrieve it.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-cloud - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-common - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-master - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-minion - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-proxy - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-ssh - 2015.8.1+ds-2
salt-syndic - 2015.8.1+ds-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: salt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2015.8.1+ds-2').
